mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.BMI AS "BMI", a.PAxis AS "PAxis", a.PR AS "PR", a.QRS AS "QRS", a.QRSAxis AS "QRSAxis", a.QT AS "QT", a.QTc AS "QTc", a.RV5 AS "RV5", a.SV1 AS "SV1", a.TAxis AS "TAxis", a.TChol AS "TChol", a.analysis AS "analysis", a.basicMetabolism AS "basicMetabolism", a.bloodSugar AS "bloodSugar", a.bloodsugarType AS "bloodsugarType", a.bmc AS "bmc", a.bpm AS "bpm", a.bpmList AS "bpmList", a.chol AS "chol", a.danguResult AS "danguResult", a.ecgData AS "ecgData", a.endTime AS "endTime", a.exceptFat AS "exceptFat", a.fat AS "fat", a.fatAdjust AS "fatAdjust", a.fatRate AS "fatRate", a.fic AS "fic", a.foc AS "foc", a.height AS "height", a.highPressure AS "highPressure", a.hipline AS "hipline", a.hr AS "hr", a.hwResult AS "hwResult", a.idCode AS "idCode", a.idealWeight AS "idealWeight", a.loginType AS "loginType", a.lowPressure AS "lowPressure", a.measureTime AS "measureTime", a.minerals AS "minerals", a.mobile AS "mobile", a.muscle AS "muscle", a.muscleAdjust AS "muscleAdjust", a.muscleRate AS "muscleRate", a.nGain AS "nGain", a.oxygen AS "oxygen", a.oxygenList AS "oxygenList", a.physique AS "physique", a.protein AS "protein", a.pulse AS "pulse", a.quganFat AS "quganFat", a.quganMuscle AS "quganMuscle", a.recordNo AS "recordNo", a.secondCount AS "secondCount", a.shape AS "shape", a.startTime AS "startTime", a.temperature AS "temperature", a.tiwenResult AS "tiwenResult", a.ua AS "ua", a.viscera AS "viscera", a.waistline AS "waistline", a.water AS "water", a.waterRate AS "waterRate", a.weight AS "weight", a.weightAdjust AS "weightAdjust", a.whr AS "whr", a.xindianResult AS "xindianResult", a.xueliaosuanResult AS "xueliaosuanResult", a.xuetangResult AS "xuetangResult", a.xueyaResult AS "xueyaResult", a.xueyangResult AS "xueyangResult", a.yaotunResult AS "yaotunResult", a.youbiFat AS "youbiFat", a.youbiMuscle AS "youbiMuscle", a.youtuiFat AS "youtuiFat", a.youtuiMuscle AS "youtuiMuscle", a.zuobiFat AS "zuobiFat", a.zuobiMuscle AS "zuobiMuscle", a.zuotuiFat AS "zuotuiFat", a.zuotuiMuscle AS "zuotuiMuscle", a.medicalExamination AS "medicalExamination", a.nert AS "nert", a.ecgImg AS "ecgImg"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM wx_medicalexaminationreport a
1=1
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.id DESC
mapper.update:
UPDATE wx_medicalexaminationreport SET BMI =#{BMI}, PAxis =#{PAxis}, PR=#{PR}, QRS=#{QRS}, QRSAxis=#{QRSAxis}, QT=#{QT}, QTc=#{QTc}, RV5=#{RV5}, SV1=#{SV1}, TAxis=#{TAxis}, TChol=#{TChol}, analysis=#{analysis}, basicMetabolism=#{basicMetabolism}, bloodSugar=#{bloodSugar}, bloodsugarType=#{bloodsugarType}, bmc=#{bmc}, bpm=#{bpm}, bpmList=#{bpmList}, chol=#{chol}, danguResult=#{danguResult}, ecgData=#{ecgData}, endTime=#{endTime}, exceptFat=#{exceptFat}, fat=#{fat}, fatAdjust=#{fatAdjust}, fatRate=#{fatRate}, fic=#{fic}, foc=#{foc}, height=#{height}, highPressure=#{highPressure}, hipline=#{hipline}, hr=#{hr}, hwResult=#{hwResult}, idCode=#{idCode}, idealWeight=#{idealWeight}, loginType=#{loginType}, lowPressure=#{lowPressure}, measureTime=#{measureTime}, minerals=#{minerals}, mobile=#{mobile}, muscle=#{muscle}, muscleAdjust=#{muscleAdjust}, muscleRate=#{muscleRate}, nGain=#{nGain}, oxygen=#{oxygen}, oxygenList=#{oxygenList}, physique=#{physique}, protein=#{protein}, pulse=#{pulse}, quganFat=#{quganFat}, quganMuscle=#{quganMuscle}, recordNo=#{recordNo}, secondCount=#{secondCount}, shape=#{shape}, startTime=#{startTime}, temperature=#{temperature}, tiwenResult=#{tiwenResult}, ua=#{ua}, viscera=#{viscera}, waistline=#{waistline}, water=#{water}, waterRate=#{waterRate}, weight=#{weight}, weightAdjust=#{weightAdjust}, whr=#{whr}, xindianResult=#{xindianResult}, xueliaosuanResult=#{xueliaosuanResult}, xuetangResult=#{xuetangResult}, xueyaResult=#{xueyaResult}, xueyangResult=#{xueyangResult}, yaotunResult=#{yaotunResult}, youbiFat=#{youbiFat}, youbiMuscle=#{youbiMuscle}, youtuiFat=#{youtuiFat}, youtuiMuscle=#{youtuiMuscle}, zuobiFat=#{zuobiFat}, zuobiMuscle=#{zuobiMuscle}, zuotuiFat=#{zuotuiFat}, zuotuiMuscle=#{zuotuiMuscle}, medicalExamination=#{medicalExamination}, nert=#{nert}, ecgImg=#{ecgImg}
WHERE id = #{id}
